RelatedSentence: Customs officials detained a man along with three gold bars weighing 2.1 kilograms at Hazrat Shahjalal International Airport in the capital last night .
Customs officials detained a man along with three gold bars weighing 2.1 kilograms at Hazrat Shahjalal International Airport in the capital last night .

On secret information , customs officials seized the gold bars from a hand bag of one Sujan when he was crossing the boarding bridge around 11:30 pm , said Ruhul Amin , assistant commissioner of the airport customs .
